text: Aix Maurienne Savoie Basket, commonly known as AMSB, is a basketball club based in Aix-les-Bains, Savoie, France that plays in the LNB Pro B. Their home arena is Halle Marlioz. ==Season by season== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:85%;" !Season !Tier !League ! !French Cup !colspan=2|Other competitions |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2011–12 | align="center"|2 | Pro B | align="center"| 4th | | colspan=2| |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2012–13 | align="center"|2 | Pro B | align="center"| 10th | | colspan=2| |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2013–14 | align="center"|2 | Pro B | 8th | | colspan=2| |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2014–15 | align="center"|2 | Pro B | align="center" bgcolor=#fcc | 17th | | colspan=2| |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2015–16 | align="center"|3 | NM1 | style="background:#BBF3BB" | 2nd | | colspan=2| |- |style="background:#efefef;"| 2016–17 | align="center"|2 | Pro B | align="center" |16th | | colspan=2| |- |} ==Notable players== * Tiegbe Bamba * Joachim Ekanga-Ehawa * David Ramseier ==External links== *Official site Category:Basketball teams in France Category:Basketball teams established in 1969 Category:Aix-les-Bains Category:Sport in Savoie Category:1969 establishments in France
